text: Hi Karolina, hope you're well. I just thought I'd drop you a message as I've updated my showreel slightly <https://vimeo.com/330523020> . This version should be 1080 and has a few extra bits now.

attachments.title: Bleddyn Wakeford 2019 Showreel
attachments.text:
A collection of work completed at Escape Studios and a few personal pieces.

Software used: Nuke, After Effects, Maya, DaVinci Resolve
attachments.video_html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/330523020?autoplay=1&app_id=122963" width="400" height="225" frameborder="0" title="Bleddyn Wakeford 2019 Showreel" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
